channel.title: Compile problem
channel.description:
Hello
i used to play this ages ago and used to know how to compile but for some reason i have forgoten how to do it and now everytime i compile i get a error reading "javac not recognised" and also when i edit and chenge the compile folder to a different one i get another error missing jdk please download, i have allready downloaded jdk 6.0 update 11 and have done that path thing. please help thanks

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

he made his tutorial too long… its really simple

right click compiler > Edit

once in you will see your path. something like _07

it could be _06 _10 etc.

Just change the number to your JDK version.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @dowon8 dowon8
item.description:
@dowon8 wrote:

Ok, go to “My Computer” and click on “View Systen Information”. Go click on “Advanced” and click on “Enviromental Variables”. Go to classpath on both things, put the type of JDK you downloaded, go to classpath on Variables for (Your Computer Acc Name) and change the .01 03 or something to your JDK type you downloaded. Do the same with your Path. Then go to “System Variables” and click on Classpath. Change it again.

I hope it will work.

Read full topic
